strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas Arts Programs Connect Through artlook速
strapiPost.content:
With the dream of increasing access to quality arts programs in local schools, Walton Arts Center and CACHE partnered to bring artlook速 to Northwest Arkansas.

  • Joining forces: artlook速 is a map-based online tool where schools across Washington, Benton, and Madison counties can share information about arts education resources and specific needs.
  • Join the platform: Each school that completed its profile by the end of 2022 was eligible to receive a $500 grant to benefit its arts programs. 

Take a look around artlook速 HERE.
